title: Chiefs take second in Day 1 of Wildcard

replies.body:
SECOND? Come on. Although I do watch them, I don't go for any of the lcs, lpl or gpl. Not even in the opl. But when it's international you have to go for your home team. So I ask you, who did the reporting for this?
In what world is this "second"?  
http://prntscr.com/89rfyv
It clearly says first place. At most TIED for FIRST place. But due to the Chiefs starting with C and DFM starting with a D. Chiefs actually hold FIRST PLACE.

It's because of the head to head score , DFM beat the Cheifs in the match between them. Yes that scoreboard is the wrong way around but it's not worth changing it considering places will change the next day
They said at the end of the stream last night that DFM were on top because the points are even between DFM and Chiefs but DFM beat the Cheifs.

Do not worry guys Chiefs are playing there best form ever, a massive improvement from when the team member where apart of Immunity. They are finally showing the world aussie bois can play league at a international level. I think that beating BT is a milestone in its own right.. Well done Chiefs, keep doing what you do best!

If the made worlds maybe aussie gamers would get some well deserved respect!

Surprisingly even matches. with the round-robin effect in place (A beat B. C beat D. D beat A. B beat C etc)

That being said I've seen better plays/teamwork from high Diamond NA/EU streamers than i did from the "best of the rest". Kinda disappoint.

Dark Passage, winners last year, absolutely terrible. Diana with the classic "rage splitpush".

"DIANA! You can't trade our Nexus for the Inhib"

https://youtu.be/3G6sEQI4I58?t=56m5s
